topic.title: System Configuration
topic.section:
The Harvester2 Configuration page can be reached from the System Information page by following the "Edit" link under Harvester2 Configuration. This feature allows the Administrator to edit the Harvester2 configuration file, config.inc.php, using a web-based form. Entering the wrong values may render the Harvester2 installation inoperable; this feature is recommended for use only by advanced users.

More information on the configuration file can be found in the documents distributed with the Harvester2 installation. See config.TEMPLATE.inc.php and docs/README for more information.
